text: læa phwk khea ca tham cea keiyw kab pracadeuxn cng klaw theid wa man pen sing thi hı thosʹ dangnan phwk cea cng hang kil hying mn khna mi pracadeuxn læa cng xya khea kıl nang cnkwa nang ca saxad khran meux nang di chara rangkay saxad læw k cng ma ha nang tam thi xallxh thrng chı phwk than thæ cring xallxh thrng chxb brrda phu sanuk phid klabneuxklabtaw læa thrng chxb brrda phu thi tha tn hı saxad
